Package fr.sorbonne_u.sylalexcenter.requestdispatcher

Class RequestDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.sylalexcenter.requestdispatcher.RequestDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, PushModeControllingI, RequestNotificationHandlerI, RequestSubmissionHandlerI, RequestDispatcherManagementI
    public class RequestDispatcher
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements RequestDispatcherManagementI, RequestSubmissionHandlerI, RequestNotificationHandlerI, PushModeControllingI
    The class RequestDispatcher implements a request dispatcher.

    Description

    The request dispatcher component will receive requests from the request generator and forward them to an application's dedicated virtual machines. When the request dispatcher receives a request, it goes through the list of available application virtual machines (AVMs) and submits the request to the least used AVM (min number of requests in queue)
    Author:
    Alexandra Tudor, Sylia Righi
